summary: The Cessna 172 is a popular American airplane, with four seats and a single engine. It was first made in 1955 and is still being produced today, making it the most successful aircraft in history. Over 44,000 have been built! It has a unique design with wheels on the front and back (tricycle landing gear). The Skyhawk is a light plane used for general flying, with competitors like the Piper PA-28.
title: Cessna 172
